moves.1. e3 e5 2. d3 d5: It looks like Black has the advantage already, but ... is he ready for what's coming up next?
moves.3. Bd2 Nf6 4. Be2 Bd6 5. Kf1: The bishops will take the original places of the king and queen.
moves.5... Bf5 6. Qc1 Nc6 7. Bd1 O-O 8. Be1 e4: With black's development complete, he pushes a pawn forward to launch his attack.
moves.10. Ne2 c5 11. c3 c4: Closing the position only makes White's defensive chores easier.
moves.12. Nd2 a5 13. h3 b5: Black has nothing on the Queenside.

gameName: Black loses against this weird opening
